projects.title: The Morning Star - Android Apps on Google Play
projects.description: The Morning Star app allows paying subscribers to access the entire paper on an Android phone or tablet. Containing all the same news, features and sport as the printed paper, the app is now available at the touch of a button wherever you are in the world. Read your paper on the go, browse back issues, or access a printable PDF copy.

projects.title: Morning Star
projects.description: The only English-language socialist daily newspaper in the world, published six days a week. est 1930

workhistory.title: Co-founder UX/UI Developer at LemonDigits
workhistory.description: Lemon Digits is a small company based in the United Kingdom. We develop, design and build computer systems - from a website application to an office network. Currently, we are developing a bespoke Content Management System for web applications and corporate websites that you'll fall in love with. With multiple business and organisational tools included to help you analyse and streamline your online presence, it is completely configurable, expandable and personally tailored to suit your needs. We're also working on a few side-projects, including our own WordPress modifications and theme library. Subscribe to our Twitter feed to find out more.

workhistory.title:
Contract Senior QA at         
            BookingBug
workhistory.description: Whilst working as the technical writer for BookingBug. I started working with the QA team to help plan out a structure and workflow for an automated end to end testing. This included researching and building a few different libraries in different languages to allow the QA team to test all of their bespoke client applications in a common gherkin based language.

workhistory.title:
Contract Technical Writer at         
            BookingBug
workhistory.description: Working with the developers and senior management to design, develop and write the developer documentation https://dev.bookingbug.com/. Used by third-party developers to integrate with the BookingBug platform.

workhistory.title: Contract Front End Developer at Tribal Worldwide
workhistory.description: Contracting part time working mainly on the vw.co.uk BAU team. But occasionally working on other accounts such as Esso and Liptons. I was employed on the front end team working with multiple technology's and frameworks such as Java, Grails, Grunt, Assemble, SASS, Javascript, SVN, Git.

workhistory.title: Guest tutor (outside professional) at Hackney UTC
workhistory.description: I was invited to Hackney UTC as an outside professional to lead a five-week course in Digital Graphic Design, taking students through why to use digital graphics, how to use digital graphics correctly and setting a client brief with the aim of each student creating a promo package and style guide in line with a radio station project they had been working on.

workhistory.title: Digital Consultant at IP Ventures
workhistory.description: Started by an associate, IP Ventures was a project I worked on as a consultant, advising on digital assets such as color palette, font stylings and contributing to scoping the brand position and overall marketing direction. As well as implementing and developing the client facing website.

workhistory.title: Contract Developer at BioPharma Asia Magazine
workhistory.description: BioPharma Asia hired me on a three-month contract to design and develop a website for a new biopharmaceutical publication, creating all aspects of the website to handle subscriptions, user permissions, news aggregation and digital editions.

workhistory.title: Freelance Contractor - Web Developer at Ignite Hospitality
workhistory.description: I work on a temp basis, creating html and css templates from PSD (photoshop) designs. as well as consulting on commercial aspects of the web development process chain.

workhistory.title: IT Administrator, UX Designer at Wildoak Residential
workhistory.description: Training staff to use the bespoke CMS and Software. In addition to this i helped develop and deisgn the website based on a bespoke CMS written from scratch. I also contributed in the creation of marketing material, designing client brochures, window cards, TV displays and all other relevant graphic design, including the launch of Wildoak International and Wildoak Magazine.

workhistory.title: Web Design/Development at Freelance
workhistory.description: multiple web projects some based on WordPress Some Not

workhistory.title: Shop Manager at Splash of London
workhistory.description: Got invaluable experience working here during the time i had off of my degree, i was in charge of the shop whilst the owner was away and was the main web developer for incoming projects. I learned invaluable experience. and I haven't wanted to through a printer out of a window since.

workhistory.title: Creator at CrossOver Sounds
workhistory.description: Record Label, Production, Promotion and Management of multiple artists. Included is a new way of viewing the music industry. Through Creative Commons.

education.title: Cert HE Commercial Music, University of Westminster
